where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( c <* SELF.contents | SIZEOF ( ['PRESENTATION_DEFINITION_SCHEMA.'+ 'ANNOTATION_CURVE_OCCURRENCE' , 'PRESENTATION_DEFINITION_SCHEMA.'+ 'ANNOTATION_SYMBOL_OCCURRENCE' , 'PRESENTATION_DEFINITION_SCHEMA.'+ 'ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE']* TYPEOF ( c ) ) <>1 ) ) =0

subtype.constraint.name: des_draughting_callout_subtypes
subtype.constraint.super.expression: (ONEOF (datum_feature_callout, datum_target_callout, dimension_curve_directed_callout, draughting_elements, geometrical_tolerance_callout, leader_directed_callout, projection_directed_callout, structured_dimension_callout) ANDOR surface_condition_callout)
